description:

Example:

title: âš”ï¸ Constants vs Variables in Go | Key Differences ğŸ“š
description:
ğŸ§  Know the difference between constants and variables in Go:

| Aspect        | Constant       | Variable       |
|---------------|----------------|----------------|

| Eval Time     | Compile-time   | Run-time       |
